channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Infrastructure

item.title: CVE-2023-2360|2024-08-02T06:19:15.009Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20infrastructure
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to CORS misconfiguration. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.2.0-135.

item.title: CVE-2023-2782|2024-08-02T06:33:05.743Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20infrastructure
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to improper authorization. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.3.1-38.

item.title: CVE-2023-45249|2024-07-29T19:04:21.442Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20infrastructure
item.description: Remote command execution due to use of default passwords. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.0.1-61, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.1.1-71, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.2.1-69, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.3.1-53, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.4.4-132.
